17-June-2022

New Docs

  • Title: TLS for Media, Player, and API URLs
  • Description: Analytics, Data Collection, and Cross-Device Resume APIs added to list of APIs that will no longer support TLS 1.0/1 - this page already existed on https://studio.support.brightcove.com, but adding to to https://apis.support.brightcove.com for better visibility
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/general/tls-media-player-and-api-urls.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Overview: Using Aspera for Ingestion to Video Cloud
  • Description: IBM Aspera is a popular solution for reliable high-speed file transfers. Brightcove offers a simple and flexible solution for adding videos and media assets to Video Cloud using Aspera.
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/aspera/overview.html
  • Category:

13-May-2022

New Docs

  • Title: Video Custom Fields Report
  • Description: This sample uses the CMS API to generate a report on custom field values for some or all the videos in your account in CSV format. It fetches the video data in batches of 25, so if there is an API timeout or some other error, you will still have some of the data.
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/code-samples/cms-api-sample-video-custom-fields-report.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Captions with Live Streams
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about using captions with Brightcove Live streams.
